Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: "Integrates an object into another object, hiding it from view but still making it interactable. Used mainly with furniture to keep the looks of rooms uncluttered. If you use the syntax that calls for a woename, it will automatically spawn that object and then integrate it."
"+integrate north wall \\"My:game:oven s=standing\\"\\r\\n\\r\\n+integrate my cookie with ceiling\\r\\n"
